title: My Room
text: This is my room. It is not very big, but I like it. There is a bed near the window. Next to the bed, there is a desk. On the desk, there is a computer and some books. There is a chair in front of the desk. I have a wardrobe for my clothes. It is brown. There are posters on the wall. They are of my favorite bands. My room is always clean because I clean it every week.

questions.question: There is a TV in the room.
There is a computer on the desk.
